page.title: 18CHIMSWELL ESTATE
page.content: 1. Estate facts: built 1975, 3x daily bus service, P.O.delivery 2x daily, 1 shop (Mace). There is a lovers' alley surrounded by pink roses, graffiti and broken glass. Teenagers meet there. People say there are gangs but you don't notice them. The Estate was built for the London overspill. There are three or four subways leading to nowhere because the estate was not finished because the money ran out. 2.Interviews with residents: most people said they liked it on the estate because it was peaceful and away from the town. 3.Housing: most houses are the same. The roofs are made of tiles, the walls are made out of brick, cement rendering and pebble dash.Each house has one toilet, 3 bedrooms, a kitchen, a living room, small garden.There are open spaces between each row of houses.
